meanings.definition: Having the shape of a hand with fingers extended.
meanings.sent1: The tree had palmate leaves that looked like open hands.
meanings.sent2: The palmate design of the leaf allowed it to capture more sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The palmate leaves waved in the wind as if they were greeting each other.
meanings.sent4: The palmate shadows of the branches danced on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The palmate leaves fluttered like delicate fingers in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Having lobes or leaflets radiating from a common point.
meanings.sent1: The palmate leaf had lobes that spread out like a star.
meanings.sent2: The plant had palmate leaves with distinct lobes branching out.
meanings.sent3: The palmate design of the leaf made it look like a tiny green sun.
meanings.sent4: The palmate pattern on the rug resembled a burst of nature.
meanings.sent5: The palmate leaves fanned out from the stem like a beautiful fan.
